import React, { Component } from 'react'; const initData = { pre_heading: "Explore", heading: "Exclusive Digital Assets", content: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Laborum obcaecati dignissimos quae quo ad iste ipsum officiis deleniti asperiores sit." } const data = [ { id: "1", img: "/img/auction_1.jpg", title: "Walking On Air", owner: "Richard", price: "1.5 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Place a Bid" }, { id: "2", img: "/img/auction_2.jpg", title: "Domain Names", owner: "John Deo", price: "2.7 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Place a Bid" }, { id: "3", img: "/img/auction_3.jpg", title: "Trading Cards", owner: "Arham", price: "2.3 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Place a Bid" }, { id: "4", img: "/img/auction_4.jpg", title: "Industrial Revolution", owner: "Yasmin", price: "1.8 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Place a Bid" }, { id: "5", img: "/img/auction_5.jpg", title: "Utility", owner: "Junaid", price: "1.7 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Place a Bid" }, { id: "6", img: "/img/auction_6.jpg", title: "Sports", owner: "ArtNox", price: "1.9 ETH", count: "1 of 1", btnText: "Place a Bid" } ] class ExploreFive extends Component { state = { initData: {}, data: [] } componentDidMount(){ this.setState({ initData: initData, data: data }) } render() { return (
{/* Intro */}
{this.state.initData.pre_heading}

{this.state.initData.heading}

{this.state.initData.content}

{/* Single Slide */} {this.state.data.map((item, idx) => { return (
{/* Card Caption */}
{/* Card Body */}
{item.title}
Owned By
{item.owner}
{item.price} {item.count}
{item.btnText}
); })}
); } } export default ExploreFive;
